tool_description: Query for Air Pollution Data, Weather information, Health Recommendations, etc... as on the official application
name: AirVisual
title: AirVisual

api_list.name: stations/v2/get-measurements
api_list.description: Get measurements at specific station by its id

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field (type is station) that returned in …/v2/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: cities/v2/get-measurements
api_list.description: Get measurements in specific city by its id

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field (type is city) that returned in …/v2/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: cities/v2/get-information
api_list.description: Get information in specific city by its id

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id field (type is city) that returned in …/v2/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: places/v2/list-by-map
api_list.description: List places in an area by providing a boundary box

required_parameters.name: NElat
required_parameters.description: North East latitude of boundary

required_parameters.name: NElon
required_parameters.description: North East longitude of boundary

required_parameters.name: SWlat
required_parameters.description: Sount West latitude of boundary

required_parameters.name: SWlon
required_parameters.description: Sount West longitude of boundary

api_list.name: v2/auto-complete
api_list.description: Find countries, cities, places by name

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Name of countries, cities, districts, places, etc...

api_list.name: places/list-by-map (Deprecated)

required_parameters.name: NElon
required_parameters.description: North East longitude of boundary

required_parameters.name: SWlat
required_parameters.description: Sount West latitude of boundary

required_parameters.name: SWlon

required_parameters.name: mapType
required_parameters.description: GoogleMap or China is allowed
